title: Cream of Fresh Asparagus Soup
ingredients: ['700g fresh asparagus', '250g chopped onion', '85g butter', '1 pinch salt', '6 tablespoons plain flour', '500ml water', '1L hot milk', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper', '2 tablespoons tamari or light soy sauce']
